text: wadhkru nemtna elykm: hin waeadna musaa 'arbaein laylatan li'iinzal altawrat hdaytan wnwrana lkm, fa'iidha bikum tnthzwn fursatan ghiabih hadhih almudat alqlylt, watajealun aleijl aldhy snetmwh bi'aydikum mebwdana lakum min dun allah - whdha ashne alkufr ballh- wa'antum zalimun biatikhadhikum aleijl 'ilhana
